name: Difficulty Tweaker
description:
This is a mod that allows you to change Minecraft's difficulty by allowing you to change local/regional difficulty; clamped local/regional difficulty; the damage scaling; the effect lengths of cave spiders' poison, bees' poison and wither skulls' wither; the distance hostile mobs are willing to fall; the probability of zombies to spawn with a weapon; the chance for a zombified piglin to spawn from a nether portal; raid wave amounts; the accuracy & cooldown of skeletons; the extra damage of arrows; the spread of fire; the damage dealt by guardians' beam; and the amount of phantoms that spawn in groups.
